about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling action-adventure journey with Baani, a first-generation college student with a tribal background attempting to uncover the secrets of her ancestors. When her friend Sarah is kidnapped by a murderous cult obsessed with immortality, Baani must confront her sanity and fight to rescue her friend before it's too late.

Explore the mysterious forests of Baani's tribal heritage. From the winding paths of Panchgani to the ancient ruins of the Bauraka tribe, uncover the secrets that lie hidden in the shadows. But beware, danger lurks around every corner as you confront a murderous cult and unravel the mysteries of immortality. Are you ready for the challenge?

Features


- Unravel the mysteries by exploring the forests of Panchgani
- Survive by using available resources at hand
- Craft items to make them into weapons and other tools.
- Get to know a little about the history of the rural tribes in India.
- Explore interesting archaeological sites
- Use the power of astral to open more pathways and take you ahead in the game.

PC Graphics

Enjoy a variety of graphics quality options to tailor to a wide range of devices, unlocked framerates, and support for other technologies including performance-boosting NVIDIA DLSS and image quality-enhancing NVIDIA DLAA. Upscaling technology AMD FSR 2.0 is also supported.

Ray-traced reflections and improved shadows*
See the city come to life with improved shadows and stunning ray-traced reflection options with various quality modes to choose from.

MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION- This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

Hardware-
- Compatible PC and 4K display device required.
- Compatible PC and display device required.
- Connect to PC via DUALSHOCK 4 USB wireless adaptor or a compatible micro-USB cable.

name: Chalice of Souls: Grahan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX Super 8Gb / AMD Radeon 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7- 13700K / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 12 GB VRAM / AMD RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on a thrilling journey with Baani, a college student with a tribal background attempting to uncover the secrets of her ancestors. When her friend Sarah is kidnapped by a murderous cult obsessed with immortality,she must confront her own sanity & fight to rescue her friend before it's too late
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
